PH097 - Testimony for the Church at Battle Creek (1868)


	Testimony for the Church at Battle Creek

     When in your midst, June 12, 1868, I was shown that you are not what God would have you to be. Sad effects have been growing out of the unbelief and worldly prosperity of the church. God designed that the light of the church should increase, and grow brighter and brighter, unto the perfect day.
